Description:
The MedicationStatement resource represents all medications a patient is taking, be it those ordered in the EMR or reported externally by either another organization or the patient themselves. The medicationStatement resource information reflects the details about how the patient is actually taking the medication even if it differs from what was ordered. The search interaction enables you to query for medication orders based on a patient and optionally status or category. You can use the Patient Search endpoint to establish an identifier for a patient without previously receiving unique identification from the server for the patient.

Starting in February 2022 or November 2021 by special update, organizations in the Netherlands can use this resource to satisfy the requirements of the MedicationUse profile.

category.Name: category
category.Description:
The category of medication orders to search for. By default all categories are searched.

Supported categories:
  • inpatient
  • outpatient
  • community
  • patientspecified

    • Starting in February 2022 or November 2021 with special update, organizations in the Netherlands can use the code 6 to search for MedicationUse profiles.

effective.Name: effective
effective.Description: Date when patient was taking (or not taking) the medication.

patient.Name: patient
patient.Description: The FHIR Patient ID. Either this element or Subject is required.

status.Name: status
status.Description:
The status for medication orders. By default, active is assumed. Active must be present in all searches (i.e. you cannot search for just completed meds).

Supported statuses:
  • On-hold
  • Completed
  • Stopped
  • Active

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: The FHIR patient ID. Either this element or Patient is required.

Bundle.Name: Bundle
Bundle.Description: Resource bundle. For more information, refer to the FHIR specification.

entry.Name: entry
entry.Description: A single entry in the resource bundle.

resource.Name: resource
resource.Description: A single resource returned as part of this bundle.

MedicationStatement.Name: MedicationStatement
MedicationStatement.Description: An instance of the STU3 MedicationStatement resource.

asAgreedIndicator.Name: extension
asAgreedIndicator.Description: Indicates whether the medication is being used as outlined in the medication agreement.

basedOn.Name: basedOn
basedOn.Description: The MedicationRequest resource that is associated with this MedicationStatement, if applicable.

category.Name: category
category.Description:
Type of medication usage. There are three categories:
  • Inpatient
  • Outpatient (those administered in the clinic - CAMS)
  • Community (prescriptions)

    • Starting in February 2022 and November 2021 by special update, organizations in the Netherlands can use the community category to return MedicationUse profiles. This category also allows searching by the code urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.3.11.60.20.77.5.3|6.

dateAsserted.Name: dateAsserted
dateAsserted.Description: The date the prescription was written.

dosage.Name: dosage
dosage.Description: The value and unit of the dosage.

additionalInstruction.Name: additionalInstruction
additionalInstruction.Description:
Administration instructions for the medication.

For patient-reported dosages in Netherlands environments, the patient-reported sig is also included.

Available starting in February 2022 and in November 2021 by special update.

asNeededBoolean.Name: asNeededBoolean
asNeededBoolean.Description: True if taken as needed (PRN). False otherwise.

doseQuantity.Name: doseQuantity
doseQuantity.Description: Amount of medication per dose. The amount of therapeutic or other substance given at one administration event.

patientInstruction.Name: patientInstruction
patientInstruction.Description:
The patient instructions for the prescription.

Starting in February 2022 and in November 2021 by special update, the patient-reported sig is returned as well.

rateQuantity.Name: rateQuantity
rateQuantity.Description:
Amount of medication per unit of time. Used when the rate is a discrete value.

Available starting in February 2022 and in November 2021 by special update.

rateRange.Name: rateRange
rateRange.Description:
Amount of medication per unit of time. Used when the rate is a range.

Available starting in February 2022 and in November 2021 by special update.

route.Name: route
route.Description: The route where the medication is taken.

text.Name: text
text.Description: The patient instructions for the prescription.

timing.Name: timing
timing.Description:
The frequency.

Starting in February 2022 and in November 2021 by special update, patient-reported frequency information is returned.

repeat.Name: repeat
repeat.Description: Element indicating an event that occurs multiple times.

boundsPeriod.Name: boundsPeriod
boundsPeriod.Description: The start and end dates for the medication.

count.Name: count
count.Description: If the medication is not PRN, and CountType is Doses, this element is populated with the count value.

countMax.Name: countMax
countMax.Description: If the medication is PRN, this element is set to Count.

duration.Name: duration
duration.Description: The medication duration. If duration is expressed as a range, this element is populated with the minimum duration.

durationMax.Name: durationMax
durationMax.Description: If duration is expressed as a range, this element is populated with the maximum duration.

period.Name: period
period.Description: The period for taking the medication.

effectivePeriod.Name: effectivePeriod
effectivePeriod.Description: The start and end date and time for the medication. If the medication is a prescription and is not discontinued, this element doesn't include an end date and time.

informationSource.Name: informationSource
informationSource.Description:
The Practioner resource associated with the ordering provider.

If the medication is considered patient reported or has a patient taking differently sig, this element instead refers to the person or organization that provided the information about the taking of this medication.

medicationCodeableConcept.Name: medicationCodeableConcept
medicationCodeableConcept.Description: If OrderedMedicationId is empty, this field is sent instead of medicationReference.

medicationReference.Name: medicationReference
medicationReference.Description: The FHIR ID representation of the ordered medication.

profile.Name: profile
profile.Description: Available in Netherlands environments only. This environment shows that this API conforms to the profile connected to the following canonical url: http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-MedicationUse

prescriber.Name: extension
prescriber.Description: The health professional that entered the medication agreement with the patient.

reasonForChangeOrDiscontinuationOfUse.Name: extension
reasonForChangeOrDiscontinuationOfUse.Description: The reason for changing or discontinuing a medication. Netherlands-specific mapping is available for this element.

status.Name: status
status.Description: The order status of the medication.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: Who the medication request is for. Reference to the Patient resource.

taken.Name: taken
taken.Description: This element is set to "unk" for unknown.
